00018 NewObjectDialog::NewObjectDialog(LibraryInterface* libInterface, VLNV::IPXactType type,
00019                                  bool showAttributes, QWidget *parent) : QDialog(parent), lh_(libInterface),
00020                                                                          attributeEditor_(0), vlnvEditor_(0),
00021                                                                          directoryEdit_(0), okButton_(0)
00022 {
00023     attributeEditor_ = new KactusAttributeEditor(this);
00024     attributeEditor_->setVisible(showAttributes);
00025     connect(attributeEditor_, SIGNAL(productHierarchyChanged()), this, SLOT(onProductHierarchyChanged()));
00026 
00027     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(type, libInterface, this, this, false);
00028     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(onContentChanged()));
00029     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00030 
00031     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"));
00032     
00033     QSettings settings;
00034     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00035     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00036     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SLOT(onContentChanged()));
00037 
00038     QPushButton *pathButton = new QPushButton("...");
00039     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00040     pathButton->setMaximumWidth(20);
00041     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00042     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_);
00043     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00044 
00045     okButton_ = new QPushButton(tr("&OK"));
00046     okButton_->setEnabled(false);
00047     connect(okButton_, SIGNAL(released()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00048 
00049     QPushButton *cancelButton = new QPushButton(tr("&Cancel"));
00050     connect(cancelButton, SIGNAL(released()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00051 
00052     QDialogButtonBox *buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox(Qt::Horizontal);
00053     buttonBox->addButton(okButton_, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00054     buttonBox->addButton(cancelButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00055 
00056     QVBoxLayout *mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00057     mainLayout->addWidget(attributeEditor_);
00058     mainLayout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00059     mainLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00060     mainLayout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00061     mainLayout->addWidget(buttonBox);
00062     mainLayout->addStretch(1);
00063     setLayout(mainLayout);
00064 
00065     setWindowTitle("New Design");
00066     setFixedSize(250, sizeHint().height());
00067     okButton_->setDefault(true);
00068 
00069     onProductHierarchyChanged();
00070 }

00072 VLNV NewObjectDialog::getVLNV()
00073 {
00074     return vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00075 }

00077 QString NewObjectDialog::getPath()
00078 {
00079     return directoryEdit_->text();
00080 }

00082 void NewObjectDialog::selectDirectory()
00083 {
00084     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00085                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00086 
00087     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00088     {
00089         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00090     }
00091 }

00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 // Function: onContentChanged()
00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void NewObjectDialog::onContentChanged()
00097 {
00098     // Enable/disable the ok button if the contents are valid/invalid.
00099     okButton_->setEnabled(!directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty() && vlnvEditor_->isValid());
00100 }
00101 
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 // Function: accept()
00104 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 void NewObjectDialog::accept()
00106 {
00107     // Make sure that the VLNV is not already in use.
00108     if (lh_->contains(vlnvEditor_->getVLNV()))
00109     {
00110         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00111                            tr("The design cannot be created because the VLNV already exists."),
00112                            QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00113         
00114         msgBox.exec();
00115         return;
00116     }
00117 
00118     QDialog::accept();
00119 }
00120 
00121 void NewObjectDialog::setVLNV( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00122         vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(vlnv);
00123     updateDirectory();
00124 }

00151 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 // Function: showDialog()
00153 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 bool NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(QWidget* parent, LibraryInterface* lh, VLNV const& oldVLNV,
00155                                    KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy& prodHier,
00156                                    KactusAttribute::Firmness& firmness,
00157                                    VLNV& vlnv, QString& directory)
00158 {
00159     // Create a suggestion for the new vlnv without the version number.
00160     VLNV suggestion = oldVLNV;
00161     suggestion.setVersion(QString());
00162 
00163     NewObjectDialog dialog(lh, oldVLNV.getType(), oldVLNV.getType() != VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, parent);
00164     dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Save As"));
00165     dialog.setVLNV(suggestion);
00166     dialog.setKactusAttributes(prodHier, firmness);
00167 
00168     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
00169     {
00170         return false;
00171     }
00172 
00173     prodHier = dialog.getProductHierarchy();
00174     firmness = dialog.getFirmness();
00175     vlnv = dialog.getVLNV();
00176     directory = dialog.getPath();
00177     return true;
00178 }
00179 
00180 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 // Function: showDialog()
00182 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 bool NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(QWidget* parent, LibraryInterface* lh,
00184                                    VLNV const& oldVLNV, VLNV& vlnv, QString& directory,
00185                                                                    const QString& windowTitle)
00186 {
00187     // Create a suggestion for the new vlnv without the version number.
00188     VLNV suggestion = oldVLNV;
00189     suggestion.setVersion(QString());
00190 
00191     NewObjectDialog dialog(lh, oldVLNV.getType(), false, parent);
00192     dialog.setWindowTitle(windowTitle);
00193     dialog.setVLNV(suggestion);
00194 
00195     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
00196     {
00197         return false;
00198     }
00199 
00200     vlnv = dialog.getVLNV();
00201     directory = dialog.getPath();
00202     return true;
00203 }

00205 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 // Function: updateDirectory()
00207 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void NewObjectDialog::updateDirectory()
00209 {
00210     QSettings settings;
00211     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00212 
00213     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00214 
00215     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00216     {
00217         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00218 
00219         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00220         {
00221             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00222 
00223             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00224             {
00225                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00226 
00227                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00228                 {
00229                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00230                 }
00231             }
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00236 }
00237 
00238 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 // Function: onProductHierarchyChanged()
00240 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00241 void NewObjectDialog::onProductHierarchyChanged()
00242 {
00243     // Update the VLNV's library field if it is either empty or any of the predefined ones.
00244     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00245 
00246     if (vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00247     {
00248         vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00249     }
00250     else
00251     {
00252         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODHIER_COUNT; ++i)
00253         {
00254             if (vlnv.getLibrary().toLower() ==
00255                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(static_cast<KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy>(i)).toLower())
00256             {
00257                 vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00258                 break;
00259             }
00260         }
00261     }
00262 
00263     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(vlnv);
00264 }
